greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest number having n abundant divisors.
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Abundant Number.
mathematica: Table[0, {m}]; n = 1; c = 0; While[c < m, k = numd[n]; If[k > 0 && k <= m && s[[k]] == 0, s[[k]] = n; c++]; n++]; s (* _Amiram Eldar_, Jun 24 2019 *)
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Dec 27 2003
